events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The customer's message contains keywords related to refund, so the issue is categorized as a Refund case.
Assigning this case to the refund support team to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, may I also ask the reason for the refund request and if the product has been opened or used?
My order number is 123456789. The product arrived unopened but it is not what I need, so I would like to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate the refund process once you send the product back. I will email you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label. I appreciate the smooth process and will send the package back today.
We have received your returned package and processed the refund. You should see the amount back on your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Thank you for the excellent customer service!
Closing the case as the refund has been successfully completed and the customer has confirmed satisfaction.
